name: GhostSync
author: DM Brad
short: Manage linking Ghost members to Discord accounts and sync subscription status to a Discord role.
description: Automatically assigns Discord roles based on Ghost blog subscription status. Uses Ghost Admin API to check member subscriptions and syncs roles at configurable intervals.
install_msg: Set your Ghost API keys with [p]set api ghost key_id,<id> key_secret,<secret> then configure with [p]ghostsync url and [p]ghostsync role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs in Ghost member notes to link accounts. No other user data is stored by the cog itself.
